attributes.action: Formally ban the use of Portsmouth Defence.
attributes.background: Ban the use of  the Portsmouth defence, known as Gay Panic, a defence used in legal proceedings to allow acts of harsh violence as a result of unwanted same sex sexual or romantic advances.
